Series Title.description: Series Title (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: 21, 24, 52, 68, 76, 300, 421, 1984, ¡Mucha Lucha!, ¡Universo!, ... etc.

Character.description: Character (type: STRING, constraint: MULTI) | Examples: Archie, Catwoman, Deadpool, Dick Tracy, Harley Quinn, Hellboy, Peacekeeper, 'Mazing Man, 0-0-0, 10th Muse, ... etc.
Character.title: Character

Genre.description: Genre (type: STRING, constraint: MULTI) | Examples: Action, Adventure, Air Force, Allegory, Animal, Army, Aviation, Bad Girl, Biography, Car, ... etc.
Genre.title: Genre

Artist/Writer.description: Artist/Writer (type: STRING, constraint: MULTI) | Examples: Alan Moore, Brian K. Vaughan, Brian Michael Bendis, Chris Bachalo, Chris Claremont, Fiona Staples, Frank Miller, Gail Simone, Grant Morrison, Jack Kirby, ... etc.
Artist/Writer.title: Artist/Writer

Superhero Team.description: Superhero Team (type: STRING, constraint: MULTI) | Examples: A- Force, Alpha Flight, Avengers, Brotherhood of Evil, Brotherhood of Mutants, Challengers of the Unknown, Dark Avengers, Defenders, Doom Patrol, Fantastic Four, ... etc.
Superhero Team.title: Superhero Team

Publisher.description: Publisher (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: 10 Ton Press, 12 bis, 12 Gauge Comics, 1First Comics, 215 Ink, 3D ZONE, 3 Finger Prints, 451 Media Group, 5-D Comics, 78squid, ... etc.
Publisher.title: Publisher

Format.description: Format (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: Album, Annual, Chapbook/Pamphlet, Clipped Strips, Digest, DVD, Hardcover, Leather Cover, Mixed Lot, Omnibus, ... etc.
Format.title: Format

Era.description: Era (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: Bronze Age (1970-83), Copper Age (1984-1991), Golden Age (1938-55), Modern Age (1992-Now), Platinum Age (1897-1937), Silver Age (1956-69)
Era.title: Era

Type.description: Type (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: Comic Book, Graphic Novel
Type.title: Type

Grade.description: Grade (type: STRING, constraint: SINGLE) | Examples: 0.5 Poor, 1.0 Fair, 1.5 Fair/Good, 1.8 Good-, 2.0 Good, 2.5 Good+, 3.0 Good/Very Good, 3.5 Very Good-, 4.0 Very Good, 4.5 Very Good+, ... etc.

Features.description: Features (type: STRING, constraint: MULTI) | Examples: First Printing, Second Printing, Third Printing, Fourth Printing, Fifth Printing, 1st Edition, Annual, Boarded, Certificates of Authenticity (COA) Included, Collector's Edition, ... etc.
